statements: SELECT field_name, crop_name FROM Fields;
SELECT * FROM Fields WHERE crop_biodiversity > 50;
SELECT field_name, crop_name FROM Fields ORDER BY crop_biodiversity DESC;
SELECT crop_name, field_name FROM Fields WHERE crop_biodiversity < 20;
SELECT field_name, crop_name FROM Fields WHERE crop_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT field_id, field_name, crop_name, crop_biodiversity FROM Fields WHERE crop_biodiversity > 10 ORDER BY field_id DESC
SELECT field_name, crop_name FROM Fields WHERE crop_biodiversity BETWEEN 5 AND 15 ORDER BY crop_biodiversity ASC, field_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Fields WHERE crop_name LIKE 'W%' ORDER BY field_id
SELECT field_id, crop_name FROM Fields WHERE field_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY crop_name
SELECT field_name, crop_biodiversity FROM Fields WHERE crop_biodiversity < 5 OR crop_biodiversity > 20 ORDER BY field_name
SELECT * FROM Crop_Fields;
SELECT field_name, crop_name FROM Crop_Fields WHERE crop_species = 'Wheat';
SELECT field_id, planting_date FROM Crop_Fields ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT outbreak_cause, outbreak_date FROM Disease_Outbreaks WHERE crop_species = 'Tomato' ORDER BY outbreak_date ASC;
SELECT field_id, field_name, crop_name FROM Crop_Fields WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT field_name, crop_name FROM Crop_Fields WHERE crop_species='Wheat';
SELECT * FROM Crop_Fields WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT field_name, crop_name, planting_date FROM Crop_Fields ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_species FROM Crop_Fields;
SELECT outbreak_date, outbreak_cause FROM Disease_Outbreaks ORDER BY outbreak_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Field;
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM Field ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, crop_variety FROM Crop WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable';
SELECT field_name, field_location FROM Field WHERE field_location LIKE '%Garden%';
SELECT planting_date, amount_planted FROM Planting ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Field WHERE field_location = 'California';
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM Field ORDER BY field_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Crop WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable' AND crop_variety = 'Tomato';
SELECT planting_date, amount_planted FROM Planting WHERE field_id = 2 ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT field_name, crop_name, planting_date FROM Field f INNER JOIN Planting p ON f.field_id = p.field_id INNER JOIN Crop c ON p.crop_id = c.crop_id WHERE f.field_location = 'Texas'
SELECT * FROM fields
SELECT field_id, field_name, location FROM fields WHERE biodiversity_level > 3 ORDER BY field_name DESC
SELECT crop_name, season FROM crops WHERE season = 'Summer'
SELECT * FROM crop_history WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT disease_name, prevention_method, affected_crops FROM diseases
SELECT field_name, location, crop_type FROM fields WHERE biodiversity_level > 3
SELECT crop_name, disease_prevention_method, season FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name ASC
SELECT field_name, crop_type, location FROM fields WHERE biodiversity_level < 2 ORDER BY field_name DESC
SELECT crop_name, disease_prevention_method, season FROM crops WHERE season = 'Summer'
SELECT crop_name, disease_prevention_method, season FROM crops WHERE crop_name LIKE '%Tomato%'
SELECT * FROM Field;
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM Field WHERE field_size > 10;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Crop;
SELECT * FROM FieldDisease WHERE infection_level > 5;
SELECT field_name, location FROM Field ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT field_name, field_size FROM Field;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, growth_period FROM Crop ORDER BY crop_type DESC;
SELECT field_id, location FROM Field WHERE field_size > 10;
SELECT bio_id, biodiversity_level FROM Biodiversity JOIN Crop ON Biodiversity.crop_id = Crop.crop_id;
SELECT disease_name, disease_cause FROM Disease WHERE LENGTH(disease_cause) > 50 ORDER BY disease_name ASC;
